# input
## md-input

## Example

```javascript
{
  "type": "input",
  "key": "firstName",
  "templateOptions": {
    "type": "text",
    "label": "First name",
    "theme": "custom"
  }
}
```

### Configuration

#### templateOptions.type _: string_

#### templateOptions.label _: string_

#### templateOptions.theme _: string_

Value of md-theme directive
